question: Is it halal to be involved in lucky drawings without paying any money.
answer:
QUESTION
Many stores have drawings monthly. After purchasing good from them they will enter you in that lucky drawings. Some time the prizes are very expensive. Is permissible to use prize.
ANSWER


Share:
The prizes won in a lucky drawing without making any monetary contribution is permissible.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
